actionPalette.name: Action Palette
actionPalette.placeholder: Your prompt... | Enter: send, Esc: cancel

notices.errorProcessingRag: Error processing related documents: {{message}}. Continuing with original text.

settings.visionProviderDesc: Optional. This is used for images. If not set, the main AI provider will be used.
settings.quickAddDesc:
Paste a shared action to add it quickly.
Important: if you already have an action with the same name it will be overwritten.
settings.promptDesc:
Please read about
Prompt templating
if you want to customize
your resulting prompts
settings.replaceSelectedDesc: If checked, the highlighted text will be replaced with a response from the model.
settings.communityActionsDesc: Below are actions collected from the GitHub discussion. Click Install to add one or share yours.
settings.communityActionsOpenDesc: Browse and install community actions made by our amazing community.
settings.communityActionsAutoUpdate: Community actions update automatically when the list refreshes. Modified actions are left untouched.
settings.communityActionsEmpty: No actions for this language yet.
settings.communityActionsError: Failed to load community actions. Please try again later.
settings.communityActionsConflictNote: An action with this name already exists. Installing will overwrite it.
settings.enhancedActionsDesc: More context can improve answer quality for powerful models, but may reduce quality for weaker ones. Larger context also consumes more tokens and increases request cost for paid models.
settings.resetActionsDesc: üö® Reset all actions to the default. This cannot be undone and will delete all your custom actions.
